markets.title: Will a permanent human colony be established on Mars by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if a permanent human settlement exists on Mars by 2030.

markets.title: Will Bitcoin reach $200k by 2028?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Bitcoin trades at or above $200,000 on any major exchange before January 1, 2028.

markets.title: Will a quantum computer reach 1,000 qubits by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if a quantum computer with at least 1,000 qubits is demonstrated by 2030.

markets.title: Will global warming exceed 2°C by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if global average temperature exceeds 2°C above pre-industrial levels by 2035.

markets.title: Will AGI be achieved before 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if artificial general intelligence is achieved before 2035.

markets.title: Will Elon Musk's Starship achieve mass-market space tourism by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Starship enables regular commercial space tourism by 2030.

markets.title: Will the metaverse reach 2B daily users by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if metaverse platforms reach 2 billion daily active users by 2030.

markets.title: Will the S&P 500 reach 6000 by 2029?
markets.description: Resolves YES if the S&P 500 trades at or above 6000 before the end of 2029.

markets.title: Will 50% of global energy come from renewables by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if 50% of global energy production comes from renewable sources by 2030.

markets.title: Will quantum AI surpass human-level intelligence by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if a quantum AI system demonstrates human-level intelligence before 2035.

markets.title: Will commercial nuclear fusion energy be achieved by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if nuclear fusion becomes commercially viable by 2035.

markets.title: Will an AI robot perform surgeries autonomously by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if an AI robot can perform surgeries without human intervention by 2030.

markets.title: Will commercial electric planes be widely in use by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if electric planes are used for commercial passenger flights by 2035.

markets.title: Will a global quantum internet be operational by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if a global quantum communication network exists by 2030.

markets.title: Will the Los Angeles Lakers win the 2026 NBA Championship?
markets.description: Resolves YES if the Lakers win the 2026 NBA Finals.

markets.title: Will AI systems be authorized as official judges in courts by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if AI can legally issue binding rulings in courts by 2035.

markets.title: Will fully autonomous cargo ships be operational by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if cargo ships operate fully autonomously by 2030.

markets.title: Will Brazil win the 2027 FIFA World Cup?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Brazil wins the 2027 FIFA World Cup.

markets.title: Will asteroid mining be commercially viable by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if companies extract resources from asteroids profitably by 2035.

markets.title: Will Max Verstappen win the 2026 Formula 1 World Championship?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Max Verstappen is the 2026 F1 World Champion.

markets.title: Will brain-computer interfaces be widely adopted by 2030?
markets.description: Resolves YES if brain-computer interfaces are commonly used by consumers by 2030.

markets.title: Will there be no major international wars by 2040?
markets.description: Resolves YES if no major international armed conflict occurs by 2040.

markets.title: Will more than 50% of ocean plastic be removed by 2035?
markets.description: Resolves YES if over half of plastic waste is removed from oceans by 2035.

markets.title: Will the 2032 Olympic marathon gold medalist set a new Olympic record?
markets.description: Resolves YES if a new Olympic record is set in the marathon at 2032 Olympics.
